EPL Mate keeping Americans informed of the 2013-2014 English Preimer Leauge Schedule

About EPL Mate

With the 2013/14 League NBC is offering unprecedented coverage on its networks and online. Never before has the US had such access to the live matches from the premiere football league in the world. EPL Mate is a simple tool to put the upcoming EPL Schedule always within sight. Including Desktop Notifications when coverage begins for your Club.
